arn.description: The ARN for a configuration for DNSSEC validation.

ownerId.description: The owner account ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) for a configuration for DNSSEC validation.

resourceId.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) that you're updating the DNSSEC validation status for.

validationStatus.description: The validation status for a DNSSEC configuration. The status can be one of the following: `ENABLING`, `ENABLED`, `DISABLING` and `DISABLED`.

resourceId.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) that you're updating the DNSSEC validation status for.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering ResolverDnsSecConfig resources.
